id.description: Globally unique ID for this task. Is used for task sorting alphabetically.

alias.description: A list of aliases for this task. Currently unimplemented

group.description: The logical group the task falls into - e.g. 'Act 1' or 'Infrastructure'

name.description: A name for this task - should be globally unique as it will appear this way in the UI

description.description: Short task description used in tooltips and other similar aspects

overview.description: Short task overview, each entry displayed as a paragraph in the UI

enabled.description: Whether this task is enabled in the score app (it will still be visible unless hidden is set to false)

hidden.description: Whether this task is hidden or not in the score app

lb_hidden.description: Whether this task is hidden or not in the leaderboard

tf_enabled.description: Whether this task is enabled in terraform (pairs with both tf_host_var and tf_participant_var below)

tf_vars.description: Variable name to enable this in terraform - the variable must be declared in both the host and participant projects (even if not used)

bq_datasets.description: BigQuery datasets to deploy for this task

source.description: Dataset CSV source - either a gs:// or https:// URL or a path relative to the root of the hacksday repo

schema.description: Dataset JSON schema - a path relative to the root of the hacksday repo

parts.description: A part of a task (subtask) configuration

id.description: ID for this part - does not need to be globally unique, just unique in the task (e.g. part1)

name.description: Name for this part as displayed in the UI

open.description: Whether this task should be shown as open by default

hidden.description: If this part should be hidden

type.description: Type of task (e.g. image or custom)

upload_text.description: Text to show on the upload button if an image task

max_points.description: Maximum points awarded for completing this part

instructions_link.description: Link to documentation for this task - should be a markdown document

good_examples.description: Up to 3 good examples used by the LLM judge to determine a successful submission

llm_instructions.description: Extra instructions for the LLM judge to help guide scoring for this part.

challenge.description: Whether this is a challenge task - not currently implemented

component.description: Custom component name to use if this task is of type custom

depends_on.description: List of dependent parts that must score for this part to activate
